name: Phantasmat: Death in Hardcover Collector's Edition
name_original: Phantasmat: Death in Hardcover Collector's Edition
description:
Phantasmat: Death in Hardcover Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It came out on 04-10-2018. It was published by Big Fish Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Phantasmat: Death in Hardcover Collector's Edition is available on PC.
